name: Management Consultancy Framework Two (MCF2)
description: MCF2 complements RM3745 Management Consultancy Framework (MCF), offering a range of consultancy services. MCF2 provides a compliant, cost effective way for central government and the wider public sector to access a variety of consultancy advice from a range of suppliers. This brochure provides an overview of the management consultancy portfolio within CCS.
benefits: Wide range of suppliers from SMEs to large multinationals
All suppliers are Cyber Essentials accredited
Financial monitoring of suppliers giving peace of mind
Maximum rates capped for the life of the framework and your project providing budgetary control
No minimum or maximum value thresholds mean you can use the framework regardless of project size
Support from a dedicated and knowledgeable team in CCS
Choice of pricing models including â€“ fixed, risk & reward, or time & materials (T&M)
A tool to help you shortlist suitable suppliers.
